attributes.action: Give Jeremy Clarkson A Knighthood, For His Services To The Motoring Industry And Television
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For years one of the only men on tv, who can make you laugh and cry in just one sentence is jeremy clarkson. 

he is not afraid to say what he thinks, he is witty, Fun and gives you a good laugh before monday morning when the grim task of education or work is forseeable.

and my god he's good at letting you know what cars are good.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
